name: The Letter (itch) (B0_studios)
description:
For summited for the 48 hour Area of Effect Game Jam.

W/A/S/D controls, at the beginning of the level, you have to hit W a couple of times to get jump to work, I didn't have time to fix it. One other bug is that a level will repeat, reload if that happens. Something I didn't have time to fix, is that the third level wasn't working in the Unity Editor, but is showing up now, so DON'T walk off there or you will have to reload, but your level will save if you reload.

You are a postman, and you have to deliver your letter to the right person (green). But be sure not to give it to the wrong person(red), or you will be fired and have to restart the level.

This is my first game jam, so it is going to be bad. I ran out of time and couldn't add more levels or a level select screen, but I think it's good for a first Jam!!
